Name: 迷宫战争(Maze Wars)
About the game: Maze Wars is a rougelike-like real-time battle game for maze dungeons. Players play programmers who are sent to the game world by their bosses for testing. They are constantly clearing customs to overcome the monsters designed by programmers themselves. They use limited prop resources to clear dungeons and finally challenge their bosses to escape from dungeons. Developer's words: a three-person independent team production, the game is obviously a lot of shortcomings, I hope you can give us suggestions, we are a group of game-loving developers, hope to accumulate enough experience in the future to develop better games. Operation mode: W S A D Controls Role's Walking Number Keyboard 1 2 3 Controls the Quick Play of Three Characters'Skills
